function.arguments:
import pyautogui, time

time.sleep(1)  # Allow the UI to settle
# Locate the Chromium icon in the sidebar using an image template
location = pyautogui.locateOnScreen('chromium_icon.png', confidence=0.8)
if location:
    cx, cy = pyautogui.center(location)
    pyautogui.click(cx, cy)
    time.sleep(3)  # Wait for Chromium to launch
else:
    print('Chromium icon not found')
